subject: Curlin (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Running down the 40-1 long shot Past the Point inside the final furlong, Curlin won the $500,000 Woodward by one and a quarter lengths.
snippet: Running down the 40-1 long shot Past the Point inside the final furlong, Curlin won the $500,000 Woodward by one and a quarter lengths.
